profile.title: Professional Objective
profile.bio: Front-end web developer with a focus on designing modern, accessible, and adaptable interfaces. Experienced in developing functional digital solutions using technologies such as React, TailwindCSS, and Vite. Aims to provide creative, efficient, and end-user-focused solutions within collaborative environments or as a freelancer.

positions.title: Frontend Web Developer
positions.description: Responsible for the complete development of the company’s corporate website. The project included responsive design, basic search engine optimization (SEO), and DNS configuration. Remote work, delivered in a production environment.

positions.title: Web Developer
positions.description: Design and development of websites for entrepreneurs, personal projects, and small businesses. Implementation of modern, responsive, and functional interfaces using technologies such as React, TailwindCSS, and Vite.

list.title: Social Network Project (in development)
list.description: Development of an experimental social network focused on affinity-based interaction and mutual relationships. The project has evolved through multiple iterations and redesigns, enabling the application of new technologies and best development practices. Implemented with React, TailwindCSS, and Firebase. Features: authentication system, personalized feeds, content publishing, reactions, and scalable architecture for future production deployment.

list.title: Introduction to the Web: History and Functioning of the Internet Certificate
